pat_annoyed: Stop it! I’m not a kid, I’m busy! (｡•́︿•̀｡) I’ve got big girl work to do!
I’m not playing around, seriously! (´•̥̥̥ ‸ •̥̥̥`) Can’t you see I’m focused right now?

Stop pampering me! (｡•̀︿•̀｡) I can do this on my own, really!

I’m a grown-up! (｡•̀ᴗ•́｡) I don’t need you treating me like a kid every time!
pat: W-What are you doing? (｡•́︿•̀｡) I’m busy, you know! B-but... thanks, I guess...
S-Stop it! I’m trying to work! (╥﹏╥) F-fine, fine... just a little... I’m still busy though!
I-I’m in the middle of something! (≧◡≦) But... okay, that feels nice... just don’t distract me too much!

Aww... you think I did something great? (｡•̀ᴗ•́｡) I’m still working, but... thank you!
Hmph... you’re always distracting me! (¬‿¬) But... I guess I’ll take it as a compliment...
I-I’m not a little kid! (╬ Ò ‸ Ó) B-but... I guess I do like it... just don’t make a big deal out of it!

I’m so busy right now! (Ｔ▽Ｔ) B-but I guess I appreciate it... just don’t tell anyone, okay?
Stop, stop! I’m working! (¬‿¬) W-wait, okay, maybe just a little... that’s all!
You’re too nice to me! (｡•̀︿•́｡) I’m trying to focus, but... I guess it’s okay this time!
Hmph... (×_×;）I’m really busy, but... a little praise won’t hurt, I suppose...
No fair, I’m not a baby anymore! (⊙_☉) But... maybe a little pat isn’t so bad... just don’t tell anyone!
I’m working really hard! (ಥ﹏ಥ) B-but I guess I deserve a little recognition, huh?
You think I did something good? (✿◕‿◕) Well... thank you, I guess... but I’m still super busy!
I don’t need a pat! (¬‿¬) But... okay, I’ll accept it... just don’t tell anyone, alright?
Hmph... I’m trying to do important things! (╥﹏╥) B-but... thank you for noticing, I guess...
I’m busy being important! (｡•̀ᴗ•́｡) But... maybe I do need a little encouragement... just don’t go overboard!
